  0: Bit  0  ($00000001 ; 1)
  1: Bit  1  ($00000002 ; 2)
  2: Bit  2  ($00000004 ; 4)
  3: Bit  3  ($00000008 ; 8)
  4: Bit  4  ($00000010 ; 16)
  5: Bit  5  ($00000020 ; 32)
  6: Bit  6  ($00000040 ; 64)
  7: Bit  7  ($00000080 ; 128)
  8: Bit  8  ($00000100 ; 256)
  9: Bit  9  ($00000200 ; 512)
 10: Bit 10  ($00000400 ; 1024)
 11: Bit 11  ($00000800 ; 2048)
 12: Bit 12  ($00001000 ; 4096)
 13: Bit 13  ($00002000 ; 8192)
 14: Bit 14  ($00004000 ; 16384)
 15: Bit 15  ($00008000 ; 32768)
 16: Bit 16  ($00010000 ; 65536)
 17: Bit 17  ($00020000 ; 131072)
 18: Bit 18  ($00040000 ; 262144)
 19: Bit 19  ($00080000 ; 524288)
 20: Bit 20  ($00100000 ; 1048576)
 21: Bit 21  ($00200000 ; 2097152)
 22: Bit 22  ($00400000 ; 4194304)
 23: Bit 23  ($00800000 ; 8388608)
 24: Bit 24  ($01000000 ; 16777216)
 25: Bit 25  ($02000000 ; 33554432)
 26: Bit 26  ($04000000 ; 67108864)
 27: Bit 27  ($08000000 ; 134217728)
 28: Bit 28  ($10000000 ; 268435456)
 29: Bit 29  ($20000000 ; 536870912)
 30: Bit 30  ($40000000 ; 1073741824)
 31: Bit 31  ($80000000 ; -2147483648)
